TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataRowState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Gets the state of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow"> object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DataRowState enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
## Examples The following example first creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one column, then creates a single <xref:System.Data.DataRow>. As the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> is created, added, modified, and deleted, its <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> is printed.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataRowState Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowState Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Added = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The row has been added to a T:System.Data.DataRowCollection?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, and M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has not been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Deleted = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The row was deleted using the M:System.Data.DataRow.Delete?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True method of the T:System.Data.DataRow?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Detached = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The row has been created but is not part of any <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection">. A T:System.Data.DataRow?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Modified = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The row has been modified and M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has not been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Unchanged = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The row has not changed since M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True was last called.
